itinerary.mapNote: Start village after drive from Kathmandu. Marsyangdi River, 1100m.
Junction village where Dudh Khola meets Marsyangdi. 1860m.
Upper village with monastery. Better acclimatisation than Lower Pisang. 3300m.
Main valley town, last large settlement before pass. 3500m.
High pasture with basic teahouses. Yak grazing. 4050m.
Base of Thorong La pass. High Camp also here. 4500m.
Sacred Hindu & Buddhist site after Thorong La 5416m crossing. 3800m.
Hot springs village. Kali Gandaki gorge. 1189m.
Rhododendron forest ridge. Famous Poon Hill viewpoint nearby. 2860m.
Trail end. Confluence of Modi Khola. Road access to Pokhara. 1025m.

waypoints.name: Thorong La Pass
waypoints.note: Circuit highpoint. Crossing separates Manang and Mustang valleys.

waypoints.name: Poon Hill Viewpoint
waypoints.note: Pre-dawn Annapurna sunrise. Most iconic photo stop on circuit.

waypoints.name: Muktinath Temple
waypoints.note: Sacred to Hindus & Buddhists. 108 water spouts. Post-pass reward.

waypoints.name: Tilicho Lake
waypoints.note: Optional from Manang. One of world's highest lakes at 4919m.

waypoints.name: Tatopani Hot Springs
waypoints.note: Natural hot springs after brutal Thorong La descent.

waypoints.name: Annapurna II
waypoints.note: Dominant peak above Pisang. 7th highest in Nepal.

waypoints.name: Pisang Peak
waypoints.note: Classic trekking peak above Upper Pisang. Permit required.

waypoints.name: Ice Lake (Kicho Tal)
waypoints.note: Acclimatisation hike from Manang. Glacial lake with 360° views.
